Introduction

ablume is an upcoming three-member girl group under Massive E&C. They will make their debut on May 9, 2025 with their first single album "Echo".

The group's name originated from the German word "Blume", meaning flower, to symbolize "growth" and the "process of blooming". Just like a small seed grows and blossoms into a beautiful flower, the three members are set to find their unique colors based on their charm and potential, and unite their individual colors to create diverse music.
